Investigating engagement in Level 2 Statistics Please join our study... You are invited to consent to your data to be included in an educational research study to evaluate student levels of engagement and teaching styles in Levels 1&2 Statistics courses in the School of Mathematics and Statistics.. To participate you only need to read the Participant Information Sheet and submit your name and student number. Level 2 Stats lecturers and tutors will have no knowledge of who has/hasn't participated in the study. All information and link to give consent is available now on the Level 2 Stats Moodle Page
